briefDescription: Aggregate type containing data used by gpu_job for synchronization.
detailedDescription: Aggregate type containing data used by gpu_job for synchronization between its work.

dataMembers.name: fence
dataMembers.briefDescription: Fence waiting for all work to be done.
dataMembers.detailedDescription: Fence waiting for all work to be done.

dataMembers.name: semaphore
dataMembers.briefDescription: Semaphore waiting for all work to be done.
dataMembers.detailedDescription: Semaphore waiting for all work to be done.
